I finally just gave up on the last guy, Mr smooth and I just bought some coins. Over all though this game is not to hard or to easy and it is fun! This game is possibly one of the best games I‚Äôve ever played, the thing I like most is that it doesn‚Äôt have too many ads which is something that annoys me in other games, second, you control by swiping and not by using buttons, third, it‚Äôs not too easy whereas other games treat you like a four year old and make the game easy, this however doesn‚Äôt do that, lastly, the floors are randomized, making it a new challenge with every floor, overall I give this game a Golden 5 stars. ü§©‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èü§©

title.label: I think the update to the new IOS bugged the game

content.label: I have been long time player of the game, it's good time passer ,but I realized after that update that the laser beams are messed up, I can walk through the ones that are not bugged and some of them are not even shooting out. Please fix this bug ruins the purpose of some of the levels and looks funny. I love the game tho, it would be nice if more maps and heros came out!
This is one of my favorite games! Some fresh characters, wallpapers, enemies, would really entice me to play more often. Such a great game don't know why it's not updated more often.
I love the game and I do play it a lot. But the more you collect coins it takes like 5-10 coins away when you close the app or watch an ad. Needs fixing.

This game is really fun. After a while though it gets kind of boring. So you uninstall it and wait a while when you reinstall it. But then you lose all your progress so it makes you not feel like playing.

Love the game, yeah, but I want an update! Redungeon just got its great update, but now we need one for platform panic! Platform Panic is more of an old antique than it is a game anymore! I want at least some new characters and a few new levels! I want to be able to play this again without getting bored quickly! But the game is fun.

title.label: Every game you make will have this...

content.label: Thank you for what you do!

I found the game to be entertaining as well as addictive. The levels are challenging enough to keep you interested, but not so much that you want to spike your phone into the ground. The classic look as well as multitude of characters with different abilities makes it a blast to collect points or attempt to break your longest run.

90% of my deaths were due to this games awful controls. 

It's difficult to describe it to you without you actually playing it once. You'll swipe up to jump, avoid a spike ball, and your character is walking to the left, towards a door, and somehow, magically, that swipe up forces your character to walk right and land on the spike ball. 

It's ridiculous how phone games attempt at platforming still, is it not obvious that platforming doesn't really work on phones?
What I wanted to point out is the music. Did anyone else think it was reminiscent of the Metroid theme song?
Awesome üëç
Fuse characters more characters and character that has all abilities of the check marked characters.
Constant barrage of ads make it unplayable. Removal of ad fee is twice the standard amount.  Oh well.

We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!We need more characters please!!!
I really liked this game but it stopes opening on my phone (iphone5c)

With the nods to old video game characters you can tell these guys actually like playing games. As a free game it's great , you can waste lots of time on it and you never need to pay anything if you reasonably feel like earning your rewards. My only complaint is a glitch that takes your revive fee coins even if you watch an ad.

Add bosses, through every few levels that huge robot we see in the spike ball elevator level should be a boss. Just open room like that. No exits. The robot shoots the lasers from its eyes and will throw spike balls and other things at you. Just an idea. Overall amazing game fun quick and easy

Yes, groovy. I'm a teenage girl and I used the word groovy un-ironically. That's the best way I can describe this game. 

It's a really quick little game. The type you can play for a few minutes in the waiting room or while standing in line at starbucks or something. The music is sweet, the colors really pop, and the gameplay is quick and smooth. It has a bit of a super meat boy vibe to it; it's hard, like really really hard. You're die in the first three rooms many times, I promise you. But that's okay, because like Super Meat Boy, the game wastes no time throwing you right back into the action. You don't ever get frustrated or angry at at. You simply can choose to keep playing, or don't. It's a fun game, but I don't feel like I HAVE to keep playing right now. I can just put it down and pick it up later. 

Okay, I rambled long enough. The game is free. If you're using an IPhone, I recommend downloading it immediately. You won't regret it, and you can always delete it later if you don't like it for whatever reason.
just read the title I played this before and since the update the hit boxes are so much bigger become super boring and pointless after 5 minutes
But that game is endless
Really enjoy the app but I can't play because it crashes every time, please fix!!!

Let me get straight to the point. This game is amazing, a little buggy and annoying, but amazing. I think something that it lacks though is variety for the characters. 

My first idea would be if you could have a couple different skins for each one, not a huge amount of coins, but maybe a hundred or so.

My second idea is if you had the possibility to fuse two characters together, giving the play both of the characters abilities and one or another of the looks. It could cost 2000 to gain the possibility, then it would be free for use.

My final request is that (as seen in the background of some of the rooms) the big robot being built can come into play. You would have to fight him by jumping on buttons or something, avoiding missiles and spikes. This level could appear every 15 levels or so.

Thank you for your patience and time!

title.label: Really fun, great graphics, great music.

content.label: Please stop sending walking dead zombie ads to my child. Either that or please change this apps rating.

I love this game it took a little time to get use to the controls but when I did I started to get addicted to it this game is so much fun! I love the characters and I love how they are spoofs of iconic video game characters like Mario and Samus. And I really like the upgrades you can give them as well. This is one of my favorite games on the app stores if I could give this game 10 stars I would. Btw please add more characters
I was jumping between teleporting pipes and got sent to another screen where the player did not spawn. This made the game unplayable until manually restarted.
One suggestion: update with new characters soon.
I love the game, but I have to say that the soundtrack sounds like a Duracell commercial.
10 outta 10 would play again

Hello I would like to talk about a little update that would be cool to add. When your first spawn, instead of moving right to start the game, you can move your character to a door about the same size as the other door, which will bring you to the shop. I find it cool because if you change your mind and you want to change your character first or if you want to buy more coins, it's a faster way. Just a small addiction I would like to see. Great game by the way!

I love the game and as far as I'm in the game, there should be a daily reward system to get peeps motivated to play for more coins! To balence this Additon "create" five or six new characters for the player to unlock. Jump on!

This game is great, I love all the hidden references to Super Metroid! Lots of other character references like, Sonic, Samus, and Mario! The game does a great job with letting you turn on and off upgrades and having the stages be random! It makes it a new challenge every try!

Platform Panic is perfect when I don't have a lot of time, mostly because I accidentally kill my character under 30 seconds almost every game. I give credit to Nitrome for its artistry, I love the colors they choose in each game they make. 
     I wish I could destroy robots when I jump on their head, instead it kills the character. Maybe it would make the game to easy, but I doubt it as the physical obstacles get increasingly more difficult as one advances through the rooms. 
     I would give it 4 stars if the robots could be destroyed by the character and If we could customize our character. 
Download this app anyway, its worth totally worth it.
